General.Name: Shan-Loong Transportation Co Ltd
General.Description: Shan-Loong Transportation Co., Ltd engages in freight transportation, container trucking, truck repair and maintenance, gas station, and import and export business in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides the container, bulk, fuel, and hazardous material transportation services. It also offers container loading/unloading, warehouse management, order processing, temperature warehousing, delivery, and reverse logistics, as well as handling, picking, and processing services. In addition, the company provides customs brokerage services; sea, air, and land shipping services; and product storage management services. Further, it owns a network of 76 gas stations that offers fuels, such as diesel and octane, as well as provides car and scooter wash services. The company was formerly known as Wang Pai Transportation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shan-Loong Transportation Co., Ltd in 1982. Shan-Loong Transportation Co., Ltd was incorporated in 1976 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 33, Minsheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 220
